title: MacVG November Update
description: This update is relatively a smaller update for MacVG but there's some really big and useful features! The update is the first monthly update starting from v1.2 and we did a lot of changes, optimizations, organizations, and more to make MacVG a better and better game site everyday. We've come a long way but we still have a lot of other things to set. So let's see what new features and changes are here in the MacVG November Update!

mainarticles.p1: Like a game a lot and play it a lot? No problem, just click on the star icon in the Tool Bar in each game, and the game will show up at the top of MacVG homepage for quicker access ‚≠ê!
mainarticles.p2: Want to play a game whenever and wherever, even without the internet? Just click on the download button in the Tool Bar for each game and fill out the download request form to download the game üíª!
mainarticles.p3: There's often problems and bugs on each game, so now you can submit a bug report or a suggestion now right from the convenient Tool Bar ü™≤!

others.other1: Fixed where the Tool Bar isn't showing or too small.
others.other3: Fixed Random Game Selector not working.
others.other4: Removed 5 games for maintainance and crashing issues.
